cont.entity_a: Sharper in image quality compared to the 28mm. Images are true to life with no distortion and are tack sharp at all apertures. The lens is sharp at 2.8. Soft at f/1.8 but sharpens at f/2.0 or f/2.2. Produces sharp images with good bokeh.
cont.entity_b: Excellent sharpness. Sharp images, especially in the center, with less sharp corners. Super sharp with excellent color and contrast. Produces sharp images with very little distortion.

cont.entity_a: Incredible build quality with a silent and smooth focus ring. Solid build quality, comparable to L lenses.
cont.entity_b: Typical of Canon L-series lenses. The lens is weatherproofed and sturdy.

cont.entity_a: Rarely requiring a flash. Very good in low light. Excellent for low light without flash, but requires precise focus due to shallow depth of field. Great for indoor shots with natural light.
cont.entity_b: The f/2.8 aperture allows for a lot of light and sharp photos in low light. Offers dramatic wide shots.

cont.entity_a: Autofocus is nearly silent, fast, and accurate. Some edge softness and occasional back focus issues.
cont.entity_b: Fast focus. The lens is clear and quick to focus.

cont.entity_a: Wide angle without excessive distortion, suitable for candid and group shots.
cont.entity_b: Great for real estate photography with minimal distortion. Perfect for wide angle shots without fisheye distortion.

cont.entity_a: It's compact but not super light.
cont.entity_b: The lens is heavy and large.

cont.entity_a: Wide enough for various shots. Wide enough for indoor shots without excessive distance from subjects.
cont.entity_b: The 16-35mm focal length range is versatile for ultrawide to wide shots.

cont.entity_a: Fast lens with excellent image quality for the price.
Has some chromatic aberration that can be corrected in post-processing.
Performs well handheld and on a tripod.
The lens is an effective 44.8mm on a cropped sensor, providing advantages of a prime lens.
cont.entity_b: Produces beautiful sun stars. Allows use of filters.

cont.entity_a: Great for portraits, providing clear images in low light.
cont.entity_b: Perfect for landscapes and night photography. Great lens for landscapes with stunning clarity and color.
